title: Explicit deployment mode selection (GCP Speed / GCP Low Cost / Local Laptop)
scope: Introduce an explicit mode enum for runs: gcp_speed, gcp_low_cost, local_laptop.
Centralize default knobs per mode (fps, decode width, model selection, SAM2 caps).
Persist the selected mode in run telemetry and report outputs.
acceptance: Runner accepts a mode flag and applies deterministic defaults per mode.
Selected mode is recorded in diagnostics and report outputs.
Local laptop mode is explicitly a real local run (not a cloud emulation).

deliverables.title: Mode config and defaults module
acceptance: Telemetry records mode and effective knobs.

subtasks.title: Define mode defaults and wire into runner.
done_when: config/modes.py exists and is used by the runner.
Telemetry includes mode and effective parameters.
